Press Releases.Title: 675 New Cases of Covid-19 Infection
Press Releases.MainContent:
As of 13 May 2020, 12pm, the Ministry of Health (MOH) has preliminarily confirmed an additional 675 cases of COVID-19 infection in Singapore, the vast majority of whom are Work Permit holders residing in foreign worker dormitories. Two cases are Singaporeans/ Permanent Residents.

2.             We are still working through the details of the cases, and further updates will be shared via the MOH press release that will be issued tonight.
